meanings.sent1: The gateposts held up the heavy gate.
meanings.sent2: We painted the gateposts to match the gate.
meanings.sent3: The gateposts seemed to gossip about the gate swinging open and closed.
meanings.sent4: The gateposts stood tall like guardians of the entrance.
meanings.sent5: I leaned against the gateposts, feeling their sturdy support.

meanings.definition: The posts at the entrance of a gate.
meanings.sent1: The carriages passed through the gateposts into the estate.
meanings.sent2: The gateposts marked the beginning of the grand driveway.
meanings.sent3: The gateposts looked like they were having a conversation about who could hold the gate better.
meanings.sent4: The gateposts stood like sentinels at the gateway.
meanings.sent5: The moonlight cast shadows of the gateposts on the path, creating a mysterious atmosphere.
